dcterms:creator: Alexis Conneau
Ruty Rinott
Guillaume Lample
Adina Williams
Samuel Bowman
Holger Schwenk
Veselin Stoyanov
dcterms:description: XNLI is a Natural Language Inference task where a premise and hypothesis are given, and the task is to predict if the hypothesis is entailed in the premise, contradicts the premise, or is neutral towards it, hence being a three-way classification problem.
dcterms:title: XNLI

dcterms:creator: Edoardo Maria Ponti
Goran Glavaš
Olga Majewska
Qianchu Liu
Ivan Vulić
Anna Korhonen
dcterms:description: XCOPA is a multilingual benchmark for causal commonsense reasoning, obtained by extending the dev and test sets of the Choice of Plausible Alternatives (COPA) dataset to 11 typologically diverse languages.
dcterms:title: XCOPA

dcterms:creator: Phillip Keung
Yichao Lu
György Szarvas
Noah A. Smith
dcterms:description: MARC is the multilingual Amazon product reviews corpus, containing title, body, and category of the review, with the task being to predict the corresponding rating from 1 to 5.
dcterms:title: MARC

dcterms:creator: Yinfei Yang
Yuan Zhang
Chris Tar
Jason Baldridge
dcterms:description: PAWS-X is an adversarial dataset for multilingual paraphrase detection, adapted from the PAWS dataset by manually translating the dev and test sets in English to six high resource languages.
dcterms:title: PAWS-X
